name: Krampus Krusher
description:
This game is a solo project in Unity. Both programming and artwork were completed by Lorne Cyr.

Overview

Play as one of Santa's elves as you maneuver through this retro themed platformer to defeat Krampus and all of his evil henchmen to save Christmas!

Additional Info

This game supports play on both keyboard and xbox 360 controllers. 
If using a controller, please be sure it is connected and powered on before launching the game. 

Controls

Keyboard:

WASD + Arrow keys to run/move

Left shift to run/pick up items, Space to jump

Esc to pause

Controller:

analog stick or directional pad supported.

hold X pick up items, A to jump.

Start to pause
